short_summary: Aws Yrsl sled, Self-Propelled, 2 Stroke Gasoline Engine
description: Genevieve Roach Genevieve.roach@forces.gc.caThis bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number W8476-2236644/A dated November 29 2022 with a closing of January 17, 2023 at 2:00pm A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders-offerors-suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure Qty 33x Sled, Self-Propelled, 2 Stroke Gasoline Engine and ILS deliverables for delivery to Petawawa, Ontario. The requested delivery date is 120 days after contract award.There is no security requirement associated with this requirement.The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
